title: 2021 Chris King Open House includes special edition Dynaplug Racer Pro & Brooks Cambium Saddles
content:
The opening of the 2021 Chris King Open House means it’s time for color. Special edition products with the limited Chris King colors, that is. In what’s become an annual tradition, Chris King opens their doors so that the public can check out their Portland workshop. To celebrate, it’s also become somewhat of a tradition

The post 2021 Chris King Open House includes special edition Dynaplug Racer Pro & Brooks Cambium Saddles appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
